description: Software Engineer specializing in high-performance backend systems, microservices, and payment processing. Founded scalable, plugin-based payment solutions at Cashfree Payments. Gem Award recipient with expertise in Java, Spring Boot, and system optimization.
author: Gagan Dhakrey
summary: Software Engineer specializing in high-performance backend systems, microservices, and payment processing. Founded scalable, plugin-based payment solutions, redesigned APIs to reduce latency, and optimized database performance for large-scale systems. Risked critical improvements to boost system efficiency. Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, and debugging, with a strong focus on secure and scalable system design. Gem Award recipient with a solid foundation in software optimization and architectural best practices.
